name: Tangela
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Tangrowth
Attack1Text: Heal 40 damage from each of your Grass Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Jumpluff
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of your remaining Prize cards.

name: Yanma
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

name: Yanmega
AbilityText: If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokemon's attacks.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Seedot
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, if this Pokemon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's next turn, it is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokemon if that damage is 60 or less.

name: Shiftry
Attack1Text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, each Stadium or Pokemon Tool card in play has no effect. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)
Attack2Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Foongus
AbilityText: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 3 Poke Ball cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Amoonguss
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Confused, it is now Paralyzed.

name: Volcarona
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Ponyta
Attack1Text: Put 2 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Rapidash
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Chimchar
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Infernape
Attack1Text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you have fewer than 10 Fire Energy cards in your discard pile, this attack does nothing. Shuffle 10 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Litleo
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Pyroar
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokemon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Volcanion
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokemon. Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokemon.

name: Mantine
Attack1Text: Discard as many cards as you like from your hand. Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon for each card you discarded in this way.
Attack2Text: This attack does 90 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.

name: Gastrodon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokemon's attacks cost Colorless more, and its Retreat Cost is Colorless more.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Dewott
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Samurott
Attack1Text: If the damage from this attack reduces your opponent's Active Pokemon's HP to 60 or less, that Pokemon is Knocked Out.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Clauncher
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Clawitzer
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokemon.

name: Bergmite
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Avalugg
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Water Energy card you discarded in this way, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

name: Mareep
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Flaaffy
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Ampharos
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon-EX.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Galvantula
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. Also apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Nidoran ♂
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Nidoran ♀ and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Nidorino
Attack2Text: If Nidorina is on your Bench, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Nidoking
AbilityText: Your Nidoqueen's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Evolution Pokemon on your Bench.

name: Drifloon
Attack1Text: Move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Drifblim
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon. Put 8 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Litwick
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and discard them. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Lampent
Attack1Text: Each player either draws or discards cards until that player has 4 cards in his or her hand. (Your opponent does this first.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Chandelure
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Supporter card in your discard pile.

name: Hoopa
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Portal Strike during your next turn.

name: Mankey
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Flop attack's base damage is 50.

name: Primeape
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If, before doing damage, your opponent's Active Pokemon has more remaining HP than this Pokemon, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Nosepass
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Probopass
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Anorith
AbilityText: Each of your Restored Pokemon has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Armaldo
Attack1Text: Move an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Croagunk
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, put 3 more damage counters on that Pokemon between turns. This effect can be applied more than once.

name: Toxicroak
AbilityText: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Sneasel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Weavile
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may put a Pokemon Tool card attached to 1 of your Pokemon into your hand.

name: Spiritomb
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Move as many damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokemon as you like to any of your opponent's other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Pawniard
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of your Pawniard.

name: Bisharp
Attack1Text: If any of your Pokemon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Yveltal
Attack1Text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Shieldon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Bastiodon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon equal to the damage done to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it.

name: Klink
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Klang
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Klinklang
AbilityText: Any damage done to this Pokemon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Gear Spinner attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Cobalion
Attack1Text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from Basic Pokemon during your opponent's next turn. This Pokemon can't use Quick Guard during your next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Marill
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Azumarill
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Klefki
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may discard all cards attached to this Pokemon and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon as a Pokemon Tool card. Prevent any damage done to the Pokemon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Mega Evolution Pokemon. If this card is attached to a Pokemon, discard this card at the end of your opponent's turn.

name: Xerneas
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokemon. For each of those Pokemon, search your deck for a Fairy Energy card and attach it to that Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Druddigon
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Pokemon BREAK in play, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Deino
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Zweilous
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Hydreigon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Discard as many Darkness Energy attached to your Pokemon as you like. This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Darkness Energy you discarded in this way.

name: Meowth
Attack1Text: You can use this attack only if you go second, and only on your first turn. Discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Persian
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon evolved from Meowth during this turn, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Aipom
Attack1Text: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order.

name: Ambipom
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. If that card is an Energy card, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Rufflet
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Braviary
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
Attack2Text: This attack does 120 damage minus 20 damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

name: Talonflame
AbilityText: If this Pokemon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Hawlucha
AbilityText: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.
